text: Escape from L.A. is a 1996 American science fiction movie directed by John Carpenter. It stars Michael Sopkiw, Cliff Robertson, Steve Buscemi, Peter Fonda, Stacy Keach, Bruce Campbell, and Pam Grier. Robertson replaced Donald Pleasence as President due to his death in 1995. It was sequel for Escape from New York. It was released on August 9, 1996. ==Sources== Category:1996 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by John Carpenter Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:English-language movies Category:Post-apocalyptic movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies set underwater Category:American independent movies
title: Escape from L.A.
